content: 3sc in side of double_crochet single_crochet in each of next 11 chain from foundation chain 3sc in side of turning chain single_crochet into side of double_crochet single_crochet 2dc single_crochet into side of turning chain 5 times break mc and fasten_off leaves with cc attach yarn in centre top ch1 space from row 11 with a single_crochet single_crochet in next 4 sts last st is
